name: iChat Saved Chat Log
summary: Learn about .ICHAT files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: ICHAT files are saved in a binary format and therefore cannot be viewed with a text editor. However, if you double-click an ICHAT file on a Mac, iChat will automatically open it to reveal the chat log.
NOTE: iChat was replaced by Messages in 2012.

description: Save file created by iChat, an online chatting application included with Mac OS X; saves the currently opened chat log and enables the user to review past discussions; created by choosing File â†’ Save a Copy As... in the iChat application menu.
